Articles.Content:
Here is a spaceplane I made a while ago, I call it the KR-71 'BlackKerb'. It sort of resembles a SR-71, so I called it the KR-71. It can carry 3 tons to LKO.

That's the video, I also have 2 other craft videos (different aircraft), but they will be remade. Download link is http://www./download/w5f25ciwrbjv8p8/KR-71_'Blackkerb&%2339;.craft

Hope you like it, I'll scrounge up rep cookie crumbles off the ground tommorow. I'll blog my future aircraft I make, mostly SSTOs. The only 3 mods I would ever use are Ven's Stock Revamp, Tweakscale, and KerbPaint.
Thank you! I was inspired to make Scott Manley's design but it didn't work, and I changed it a bit because it didn't work for me, so give some credit to him.
